caption: Figure 2: Iterative debugging and testing.
description: The figure illustrates the iterative debugging and testing process within the AutoKaggle framework, showing how code is generated, executed, debugged, and tested until it passes all unit tests.
section: 3.2 DEVELOPMENT BASED ON ITERATIVE DEBUGGING AND TESTING

caption: Figure 1: Overview of AutoKaggle. AutoKaggle integrates a phase-based workflow with specialized agents (Reader, Planner, Developer, Reviewer, and Summarizer), iterative debugging and unit testing, a comprehensive machine learning tools library, and detailed reporting.
description: The figure illustrates the architecture of AutoKaggle, a multi-agent framework for autonomous data science competitions, highlighting its phase-based workflow, specialized agents, and iterative debugging process.
